# King Leka

King Leka may refer to:
* Leka, Crown Prince of Albania (1939â€“2011), also known as King Leka I, son of Zog I of Albania; father of Leka II
* Leka, Prince of Albania, also known as King Leka II, grandson of Zog I of Albania, son of Leka I
